text: Lt. Gen. Mompati Sebogodi Merafhe (6 June 1936 - 7 January 2015) was a Botswanan politician. He was Vice-President of Botswana from 2008 to 2012. He was a Lieutenant-General and was Botswana's Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1994 to 2008. Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Botswana politicians Category:Vice presidents of Botswana
title: Mompati Merafhe
